quest.name: Clammed Up
journal:
Zukin is clamoring for giant clams.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Obtain slick debris from giant clams.
Deliver the slick debris to Zukin.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Forename, you are familiar with giant clams, yes? They have an appetite to match their prodigious size, and are known to indiscriminately devour random objects that drift by.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: I would be grateful if you could seek out these clams, prise them open, and bring back the slick debris you find inside. Four such pieces should suffice.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, and with your arms intact. Just as well─we may still have need of them. But come, let us see what the clams have rendered up.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Yes, these are precisely what I sought! You have done well, my friend.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: When a foreign object settles inside a shell, it gradually develops a hard and lustrous coating. While such articles are not as valuable as a well-formed pearl, they are not without worth. Nor is it unheard of for clams to be holding treasures!
